sentences: Eesti Vabariigi Valitsus on täidesaatva riigivõimu kõrgeim organ.
Soome ja Austria valitsused moodustavad oma riikide juhtorganeid.
Uue kuninga valitsuse ajal rahva elu mõnevõrra paranes.
context: In Estonian, 'valitsus' primarily means the highest executive organ of state power or government. It can also refer to ruling authority or administration in a broader sense. The word is commonly used when referring to national governments (like 'Eesti Vabariigi Valitsus'), as well as historical contexts where it may denote periods of governance by specific rulers.
